## Provider.findPoolIdent() method

Finds a matching pool on the SundaeSwap protocol and returns only the ident.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract findPoolIdent({ pair: [coinA, coinB], fee, }: IPoolQuery): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { pair: \[coinA, coinB\], fee, } | [IPoolQuery](./sdk-core.ipoolquery.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;
